title: Looking for SGC Graded Rochester Players
author: jmarascojr

posts.post_title: Looking for SGC Graded Rochester Players
posts.post_content:
Morning,

I have significantly downsized my collection, but would like to keep one small project going.

Looking for SGC graded (only) Rochester players.

Emil Batch
Cy Barger (already have a SGC 2)
John Butler
Bill Chappelle
John Ganzel
Billy Maloney

Looking for lower grades preferably, can be new or old labels.
thursday bump, any rochester out there?

[quote name="jmarascojr" post=2095560]thursday afternoon bump[/QUOTE]


PM sent 


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
FYI, listed Barger SGC1.5 EPDG on the BST this morning, if u are interested hit me up, thx, Colton

Still looking to upgrade my Emil Batch if there's any out there...

I'd even look at lower grades if it presents better.

[url=https://flic.kr/p/2kJerd1][img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/51017385220_7d8ae33f64.jpg[/img][/url]
I have a Batch SGC 55 (4.5), and a Chappelle 60 (5), if interested.
